TaskDescription:
Upgrade your previous program, so when photocell detects workpiece, entry piston will push it forward. First, click DEL or C on keyboard to remove previous NewWorkpeace.
-Enclose your code in If statement, where toggle switch is not activated.
-Detect Photocell entry rising edge with the help of two variables.
-Use (TON-Timer On Delay) to wait 1 second after edge detection to not open the valve to soon.
-Use (TP-Timer Pulse) timer to trigger signal for 3 seconds so the piston is fully extenden
-Start testing, just after you spawned new workipece
-You can upgrade your program to return the piston back (this is not included in test)

ChatBubbles.Text: When coding, use RESTART button to reset the scene. Don't forget starting the compressor!
